query:
-- Delete all old collaborator entries pointing to non-existent trip
DELETE FROM trip_collaborators WHERE tripId = 1;

-- Add collaborators to the correct trip (30001)
INSERT INTO trip_collaborators (tripId, userId, permission) VALUES
(30001, 1020034, 'view_only'),  -- Efi
(30001, 1020036, 'view_only'),  -- Michal
(30001, 1080001, 'view_only'),  -- Efi Goren (duplicate account?)
(30001, 1080005, 'view_only');  -- mikgrn (duplicate account?)
